messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We need the BSA-67 Artillery, get working on it lads

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">New book titled "Guide to fursuit RP" now available in the library</font>

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Hey guys, two new books added to my collection, we now have a childrens moralistic story titled "the story of charlie and bill" and the new addition of a porn magazine from some company i head about. Enjoy</font>
